aspguidc.service.generation

Class SourceCodeGenerationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • aspguidc.service.generation.SourceCodeGenerationService

  • public class SourceCodeGenerationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class which provides method regarding to the generation of the source code of the output program. An instance of this class is assigned to a single target directory, which is used to store the generated source code.

    The generated source code consists of fixed source files and dynamic source files: Fixed source files are stored in the program_structure folder of the program resources and are copied to the output program source without any modification. Dynamic source files are stored in the program_template folder of the program resources. This files are .twig template files and are processed individually based on the gui definition of the logic program during the generation of the source code of the output program. The template files are processed by the template writer objects inside the writer package.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SourceCodeGenerationService(java.io.File targetDirectory)
      Create a new generation service instance with the given directory as output directory.

      Generate the output program source code based on the given gui definition model, logic program file and name of the jar file into the target directory which is assigned to the service instance.

    • Method Detail

      • generateSourceCode

        public void generateSourceCode(GraphicalUserInterfaceDefinition guiDefinition,
                               java.io.File logicProgramFile,
                               java.lang.String jarFileName)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Generate the output program source code based on the given gui definition model, logic program file and name of the jar file into the target directory which is assigned to the service instance.
        Parameters:
        guiDefinition - gui definition which is used for source code generation
        logicProgramFile - logic program file which is copied to the source code directory
        jarFileName - name of the jar file which can be generated by the build file in the source code directory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
